title: Опасные связи
overview: Do you want to expose the deceiver? Prove your significant other's infidelity? Or, on the contrary, make sure that your loved one does not have any "dangerous connections" on the side? The show's hosts Dmitry Rybin and Denis Grebenyuk will help you find out the truth! Honest and principled, they collect irrefutable evidence to prove or disprove the fact of treason.
